import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Remove urgent flag from ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/mark-not-urgent"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes the urgent flag from a ticket, returning it to normal priority handling in agent queues and workflows. Use this when the urgent situation has been addressed or when a ticket was mistakenly flagged as urgent.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with urgent filter to find flagged tickets and extract `Items[].TicketId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find urgent tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with `IsUrgent: true` filter → extract `TicketId`
2. Review: Confirm the urgent situation has been resolved
3. Remove flag: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/mark-not-urgent](/docs/api/tickets/mark-ticket-not-urgent)
4. Verify: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) to confirm `IsUrgent: false`

**Use Cases**: De-escalating tickets after emergency resolution, correcting accidental urgent flags, normalizing queue priority after initial response.

**Note**: Removing the urgent flag may affect the ticket's position in agent queues and stop escalation workflows that were triggered by the urgent status.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/mark-urgent](/docs/api/tickets/mark-ticket-urgent) – Mark ticket as urgent
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) – Filter by urgent status
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/set-priority](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-set-ticket-priority) – Adjust priority levels
